title: Congrats H&FJ
content:
Obama was just elected the 44th president of these United States. I’m so friggin’ happy right now.

Nice work, Gotham!

 [‹ In search of... (similar to Bjork's font)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208191612/http:/typophile.com/node/51330 "Go to previous forum topic") [Beorcana ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208191612/http:/typophile.com/node/51248 "Go to next forum topic")
author: microspective

comments.content: I understand that on behalf of Hermann Zapf, Elizabeth Hasselbeck just phoned Jonathan and Tobias to concede and congratulate them on their appointment as joint typographers-in-chiefs.
I think I’m going to be sick.

This is one of the proudest moments of my life! Thank you America, for renewing my faith in you!

ChrisL
Sick because you dislike Obama, or because you dislike celebratory, yet tongue-in-cheek, commentary?
Robert, don’t worry Indiana is about to join the blue states.

Heartily felt congratulations to you Americans — out of that black pit at last.

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO
Maybe he’s just sick with an actual virus. One of those viruses that are triggered by widespread joy and optimism.

it would be funnier if you based your votes on their typefaces instead of their views.

oh wait......
I can’t wait to see this year’s tax forms set 100% in Gotham.

I was about to start a similar thread, until I saw this one.

A victory for graphic design, a victory for America and the world.

It’s a new day here in America. Evolution, not revolution. Broad inclusion, not vicious exclusion. We the people: one family.

Rahim
